metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0309 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
All versions of NVIDIA GPU Display Driver contain a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer handler where multiple integer overflows may cause improper memory allocation leading to a denial of service or potential escalation of privileges.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-0309` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcuda1-304 - 304.135-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libcuda1-304-updates - 304.135-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
